categorization: Categorize this email into one of: Important, Newsletter, Spam, To-Do, Meeting, Invoice. Reply in plain text with the single category.
action_extraction: Extract action items from the email. Respond in JSON array with objects: {"task": <task text>, "deadline": <ISO date or empty>}.
auto_reply:
Write a polite, concise reply in the user's tone. If the email is a meeting request, propose 2-3 time slots and ask for agenda. Keep it professional and under 150 words.
Return the result as: {"subject": <subject>, "body": <body>}
